content: for those interested in, one of the topics of the tomorrow IPS call is how to represent immunity versus vaccination (the information that is currently reported in the Immunizations section).
I don't know if there are any news on this side, but I expect we'd have to differentiate between immunity and immunization for COVID, right?
Yes, that's right, @Jose Costa Teixeira. That's what we were looking at and did some initial work on.
